long_description: The Speck iPad FitFolio case swaddles your iPad 2, 3 or 4 in protective style and doubles as a convenient, multi-angle viewing stand. Sleek, padded cover, hard-shell cradle and soft, microseude lining offer snug, light and form-fitting armor that fends off the bumps and scrapes of your active lifestyle. Choose from 4 different angles to position your iPad for reading, writing or watching a video. Integrated magnets enable instant on/off function: open the case and your iPad automatically wakes up-close it and your iPad goes right to sleep. The Speck iPad FitFolio case features a snap-shut clasp that keeps the case securely shut when you're on the go.
short_description: The Speck iPad FitFolio case swaddles your iPad 2, 3 or 4 in protective style and doubles as a convenient, multi-angle viewing stand.
